Q456:
Welcome to this research study!  

 

We are interested in understanding how hikers and backpackers decide to take water along their hikes.  You will be presented with a hiking/backpacking scenario and asked to answer a question regarding how you would choose to proceed in that scenario. Please be assured that your responses will be kept completely confidential.


The entire survey should take approximately 10 minutes to complete.  Your participation in this research is voluntary. You have the right to withdraw at any point during the study, for any reason, and without any prejudice. If you would like to contact the Principal Investigator in the study to discuss this research, please e-mail Jason Papale (papale47@berkeley.edu), Marcus Streips (mastreips@berkeley.edu), or Collin Cunningham (collincun@berkeley.edu).

By clicking the button below, you acknowledge that your participation in the study is voluntary, you are 18 years of age, and that you are aware that you may choose to terminate your participation in the study at any time and for any reason.
Q2: Age - What Year Were You Born? (1900-2002)

Q17: In any of your hiking experiences, have you hiked along any desert sections, where water was unavailable?
